SkillCommand.En:
Repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
Repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.

SkillCommand.En:
After pressing <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment
and then consecutively press <KC ATTACK1>
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
After pressing <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment
and then consecutively press <KC ATTACK1>
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.

SkillInfo.En: Swing the lance continuously over a wide range.
SkillInfo.Jp: Swing the lance continuously over a wide range.

SkillCommand.En:
Press <KC ATTACK1> while in the air
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
Press <KC ATTACK1> while in the air
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.

SkillInfo.En:
Stab the lance into the ground from above.
The power of the attack increases when performed from higher altitudes.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Stab the lance into the ground from above.
The power of the attack increases when performed from higher altitudes.

SkillCommand.En:
<PADM>While in the moving in the air with the left stick, 
press <KC ATTACK1>
<KEYM> While in the moving in the air, press <KC ATTACK1></KEYM>
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
<PADM>While in the moving in the air with the left stick, 
press <KC ATTACK1>
<KEYM> While in the moving in the air, press <KC ATTACK1></KEYM>
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.

SkillCommand.En:
Press <KC ATTACK2>
Further enhanced in Heal Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
Press <KC ATTACK2>
Further enhanced in Heal Boost mode.

SkillInfo.En:
Deploy a spiritual sphere that recovers health.
The sphere will stick to enemies when cast nearby them.
Can be used mid-air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Becomes Aid More and sphere duration is
extended.</COL>
SkillInfo.Jp:
Deploy a spiritual sphere that recovers health.
The sphere will stick to enemies when cast nearby them.
Can be used mid-air.
<COL ffdc78>LV UP: Becomes Aid More and sphere duration is
extended.</COL>

SkillCommand.En:
Press <KC ATTACK2>
Further enhanced in Heal Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
Press <KC ATTACK2>
Further enhanced in Heal Boost mode.

SkillInfo.En:
Deploy a spiritual sphere that recovers health.
The sphere will stick to enemies when cast nearby them.
The duration of the sphere is extended.
Can be used mid-air.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Deploy a spiritual sphere that recovers health.
The sphere will stick to enemies when cast nearby them.
The duration of the sphere is extended.
Can be used mid-air.

SkillCommand.En: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>
SkillCommand.Jp: While being knocked away, press <KC JUMP>

SkillInfo.En: Avoid falls when knocked away by enemies.
SkillInfo.Jp: Avoid falls when knocked away by enemies.

SkillInfo.En:
Duck and avoid enemy attacks.
It is possible to increase the Spirit Gauge by
avoiding attacks with decent timing.
Evasive distance is increased while in
Attack Boost/Heal Boost.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Duck and avoid enemy attacks.
It is possible to increase the Spirit Gauge by
avoiding attacks with decent timing.
Evasive distance is increased while in
Attack Boost/Heal Boost.

SkillInfo.En:
Temporarily enhance support skills.
Also, when activated, it will restore the health of allies
and significantly strengthen their resistance toward all
status abnormalities.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Temporarily enhance support skills.
Also, when activated, it will restore the health of allies
and significantly strengthen their resistance toward all
status abnormalities.

SkillCommand.En:
Press <KC ELIXIR_CHANGE> or <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>
during any Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
Press <KC ELIXIR_CHANGE> or <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>
during any Boost mode.

SkillInfo.En:
Consume a portion of the Spirit Gauge,
and cancel the active boost.
SkillInfo.Jp:
Consume a portion of the Spirit Gauge,
and cancel the active boost.

SkillCommand.En:
Repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1> while climbing.
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
Repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1> while climbing.
Further enhanced in Attack Boost mode.

SkillInfo.En:
While climbing an enemy, pierce them with
the lance. Pressing the button repeatedly increases the 
number of attacks.
SkillInfo.Jp:
While climbing an enemy, pierce them with
the lance. Pressing the button repeatedly increases the 
number of attacks.

Press <KC ELIXIR_CHANGE> or <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>
during any Boost mode.
SkillCommand.Jp:
Press <KC ELIXIR_CHANGE> or <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>
during any Boost mode.

SkillInfo.En:
Consume a portion of the Spirit Gauge,
and cancel the active boost.
